user.title: FERMAX Connection Credentials
user.description: Enter your FERMAX DuoxMe account credentials and the OAuth details from the mobile app. For more details on how to obtain these, please see the [documentation]({docs_link}).

fcm.title: Push Notification Credentials (FCM)
fcm.description: Enter the Google Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) credentials. These are required to receive real-time notifications from your doorbell, and a core part of this integration. For a detailed guide, see the [documentation]({docs_link}).

error.invalid_auth: Invalid username, password, or client credentials. Please check and try again.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Fermax account is already configured.

init.title: FERMAX DuoxMe Options
init.description: Enable this to listen for real-time events from FERMAX's servers. This provides instant ring notifications with live snapshots from your doorbell. If disabled, only the door lock entity will be available.
